message.content:
cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.SY. 

The paper presents a framework for teaching robots through demonstrations and coaching, which involves reinforcement learning methods. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the Robotics (cs.RO) sub-category. Additionally, the paper involves learning from demonstrations and generalizing the learnt task policy, which are common topics in Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. The paper also involves evaluating the proposed approach with a scooping task, which suggests that it may belong to the Computer Vision (cs.CV) sub-category. Finally, the paper involves using coaching to extend the policy learnt to be adaptable to varying task goals, which suggests that it may also belong to the Systems and Control (cs.SY) sub-category.
